name: Hexic Sprinter (2D)
description:
Thank you guys for viewing my Hexic Sprinter Page !!

So, this game is a VERY simple platformer, with basic controls and movement.

Although there are some errors, pls do download and play, and let me know how it was !!

This game will be recieving updates soon, So Stay Tuned !!

Made with Unity 2D !!

Its the one of the best game creation ENGINE !!

Recommended to download !! (Its Free !!)
